meanings.definition: The act of browsing the internet.
meanings.sent1: Netsurfing is a fun way to discover new websites.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy netsurfing in the evenings to relax.
meanings.sent3: While netsurfing, I stumbled upon a website about funny cat videos.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a vast ocean, netsurfing through endless information.
meanings.sent5: Netsurfing allows you to explore the digital world at your fingertips.

meanings.definition: To navigate or explore websites on the internet.
meanings.sent1: I will netsurf to find the best deals online.
meanings.sent2: She netsurfs every day to stay updated with the latest news.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be netsurfing on the laptop when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts netsurfed through different websites, seeking inspiration.
meanings.sent5: Netsurfing is like diving into a sea of information waiting to be discovered.
